code: import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faBus}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./AluguelOnibus.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AluguelOnibus=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const cards=[{text:"Desenvolvemos uma logística de transporte otimizada para sua empresa.
